description:
Ginoza Nobuchika is an Inspector and the leader of http://anidb.net/ch76608 [Public Safety Division 1] at the http://anidb.net/ch76607 [Public Safety Bureau].
After his father http://anidb.net/ch48543 [Masaoka Tomomi] was killed during the final showdown with http://anidb.net/ch48756 [Makishima Shougo], Ginoza`s Crime Coefficient rises above regulation levels to 140, and he is demoted to an Enforcer at Division 1.
name: Ginoza Nobuchika
